source.7d90daab:
12/11/2021

This notebook was made according to the Pima Indians Diabetes database on kaggle found: shorturl.at/pBV35

This data will be used to predict if a patient has diabetes. All patients are female and at least 21 years old of Pima Indian heritage. The total number of participants in this study is 768. The dependent variable is Outcome
source.fa60a9c2: Check the amount of each group to make sure there is somewhat equal representation, data would be skewed in the event the data is very imbalanced
source.5bcd8384: Some variables to watch are Glucose, to lesser extent: Pregnancies, BMI, Age
